title: Transient is looking for a top laner!
body:
Hey title says all, we are looking for a top laner while our current top laner is busy with school. We are looking for someone who is relaxed when playing, knows how to play common top laners, and is able to skype with the team. We are looking for people who are PLAT1+. We are a DiamondV team, to play R5s daily.

Add Hoodlum for more details, or message our facebook page.
